snippet: Philip A. Falcone, the head of Harbinger Capital Partners, took Senator Charles E. Grassley to task for accusations about his lobbying efforts on behalf of Lightsquared, his start-up wireless venture.
abstract: Philip A. Falcone, the head of Harbinger Capital Partners, took Senator Charles E. Grassley to task for accusations about his lobbying efforts on behalf of Lightsquared, his start-up wireless venture.
lead_paragraph: Senator Charles E. Grassley, Republican of Iowa, has made attacking hedge funds something of a campaign strategy over the last year, commenting with striking frequency on everything from insider trading to suspect lobbying.

headline.main: Falcone Brawls With Grassley Over LightSquared
